item.title: Economy Profiles
item.description: An internal training session for the GII Profiles project.

item.title: GII Economy Profiles
item.description: Objective To internalize and automatize the production of the Global Innovation Index (GII) economy profiles. See related workshop here. Description One of the main components of the GII report is the economy profiles. The profiles provide an overview of each economy’s performance within the GII for the specific report year. They summarize model output, highlight outdated and missing data, and identify indicator strengths and weaknesses. The profiles for the GII 2022 can be seen here.
